title: Google backtracks on plan to force all Android apps to use Play Billing
content:
The Google Play Store and Apple App Store both officially require developers to use their payment systems for in-app purchases, though the rule isn’t universally enforced. description: Google has granted Spotify an exception for its upcoming Play Billing rules, which might eventually open up to other app developers.
